sentences.sContent: This year, No Child Left Behind requires 77.5 percent of Illinois students to meet or exceed standards.
sentences.sContent_eng: This year, No Child Left Behind requires 77.5 percent of Illinois students to meet or exceed standards.
sentences.sCn: 今年，《一个都不能少》规定伊利诺斯州77.5%的学生要达到甚至超过该标准。

sentences.sContent: Gas prices in Illinois are among the highest in the country, partly because several refineries in that region experienced problems and delays.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gas prices in Illinois are among the highest in the country, partly because several refineries in that region experienced problems and delays.
sentences.sCn: 伊利诺斯州油价在全美来说属最高之列，部分原因是由于该地区的炼油厂出现问题与延迟。

sentences.sContent: And although I’m not sure that the people who heard me deliver it were similarly impressed, enough of them appreciated my earnestness and youthful swagger that I made it to the Illinois legislature.
sentences.sContent_eng: And although I’m not sure that the people who heard me deliver it were similarly impressed, enough of them appreciated my earnestness and youthful swagger that I made it to the Illinois legislature.
sentences.sCn: 尽管我不清楚那些听过我这篇演讲的人们是否也同样被感动了，但他们中足够多的人都欣赏我的热忱和年青气盛，我得以成功入选了伊利诺斯州州议会。
